alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Northern Cayuga; Ontario; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:38AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wayne, east central Livingston, Cayuga, western Oswego and Ontario Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 138 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Marion to near Harrison Valley. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Ontario, Newark, Williamson, Marion, Lyons, Palmyra, Victor, Bristol, Clifton Springs, Clyde, Phelps, Sodus, Bloomfield, Naples, Rushville, Chimney Bluffs State Park and Farmington. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 44 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Livingston; Northern Cayuga; Ontario; Oswego; Wayne
